introduction: Los fines de semana tells the story of the reunion between Melisa, an 8-year-old girl who lives in a world of fantasies, and her father, absent for years. Over two weekends at the family home, she searches for a fairy while he tries to rebuild a bond marked by guilt and absence. The house, filled with memories and family tensions, witnesses how fairy tales crumble under broken expectations. A story about family bonds, the loss of innocence, and redemption.
